SummaryEnglish: Kei and Naoki are childhood friends who are recruited into a government-supervised group called Spirits. Spirits members are trained to defend the Earth against mysterious attackers by piloting the Devadasy, a powerful mech discovered by Kei's grandfather. But a lot of things about the Devadasy remain unknown, and that void could cost lives...

1.SummaryEnglish: A young boy decides to join a secret paramilitary organization, Spirits, in order to avoid school and follow some cute recruiter chick. His adopted sister gets mad and joins Spirits out of pure spite and jealousy.

2.SummaryEnglish: Two friends, Kei and Naoki, join Spirits to help save mankind and become Devadasy's pilots.
